text: Nza vhɨra zazera khueŋ nzuav Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav ana ndikndigi. Nde nza thɨɨri tɨn Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ ndiav, nde guma won ndɨkndɨgar nzuai buni ndi tɨva muuŋgiap ne ndigi fhuvara. Nde guigira Fhe Bakɨme buna guareŋ, nde ne khothɨgap ne ndigi. Ne guigira Fhe Bakɨme buna guareŋ ma. Mba buneŋ, nde guigira Zisas Krais khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, mba buneŋ khaŋ tɨgap havhargiap, nde ndavi vherir ŋgari.
